data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Lubombo.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lubombo, Swaziland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 4,488 believers in the state of Lubombo into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 4,488 believers in Lubombo and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Lubombo, Swaziland find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Lubombo, Swaziland.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Lubombo, Swaziland.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Lubombo, Swaziland.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Lubombo
location.cities_list: Big Bend, Mhlume, Siteki, Vuvulane, Nsoko
